name: Twisted Satellite Demo
description:
We are working on a physics-based VR puzzle game for Quest 2 and PC-VR. The player uses his gravity gloves to transform the level and to find his way through a mysterious space station. That's Twisted Satellite.

Try our demo for free. The game is coming out in summer this year. 

Build tested on Meta Quest 2. PC version (Oculus Rift) of the demo coming later this week. 

Please follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/LameLizardGames 

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/WjszFfHY

We are happy to hear any type of feedback and thank you for playing! You can find the instructions on how to play in-game.
